content.rendered:
Directed by Koratala Siva.

Written by Rajan Agarwal. Srihari Nanu. Koratala Siva.

Cast Mahesh Babu(Bharath). Kiara Advani(Vasumathi). Prakash Raj(Varadarajulu). R. Sarathkumar(Raghavulu (as Sarath Kumar)). Devaraj(Sripathi). Rajsekhar Aningi(Subodhayam Subba Rao). Aamani(Bharat’s mother). Sithara(Bharat’s step mother). Saakshi Siva(Bharath’s Uncle (as Saakshi Sivaa)). Anish Kuruvilla(Srivatsal). Kadambari Kiran(Bharath’s Driver). Jayalalitha(Assembly Speaker). Mukhtar Khan(Mukhtar (as Mukthar Khan)).Jayavani. Jeeva(Parabrahmam).Devadas Kanakala.Sandhya Janak. Ajay(Aravind Krishna).Ramajogayya Sastry. Banerjee((as Banerji)). Kaumudi(Manju). Brahmaji(Bhaskar).Guru Charan. Mikail Gandhi(Siddharth (as Mikhail Gandhi)).Krishna Murali Posani.Prudhviraj.Rao Ramesh.Sammeta Gandhi.Vinay Varma.Rahul Ramakrishna.Rajitha.Mahadevan. P. Ravi Shankar(Daamu). Yashpal Sharma(Manohar).Shatru.Gundu Sudharshan.Temper Vamsi. Surya(Mithra) . Darbha Appaji Ambarisha(Additional Secretary to CM). Ayan((as Ayan Nayak)).Gaurav Kumar.Veera Ravi Kumar Yalla

Language Telugu.

Producers Ayan. Dibyendu Roy Chowdhury. D.V.V. Danayya. Dasari Kalyan. Narravula Gopi Krishna. Raj Kumar. Koti Paruchuri. B. Bala Prasad. E.V. Rajkumar.

Production DVV Entertainment.
